adjectives.description: scutiform (comparative more scutiform, superlative most scutiform)

entries.meaning: Having the shape of a shield; scutate.
(archaeology) A symbol that is shaped like a shield.
examples: There are similarities between the form of the central boss on scutiforms and the central setting on filigree pendants, and between the use of punched dot decoration on scutiforms and beaded wire on filigree pendants. Scutiforms, however ...
